data.title: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan News
data.meta_description: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan News: Check out the latest news about Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan along with Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan movies, Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan photos, Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan videos and more on Times of India Entertainment.
data.text:
Rahat Fateh Ali Khan: From legal issues to public disputes, a look at controversies surrounding the Pakistani singer

etimes.in / Jul 22, 2024, 21:36 (IST)

Pakistani singer Rahat Fateh Ali Khan, who is often celebrated for his soulful music and contributions to both Pakistani and Indian cinema, has faced several controversies throughout his career. From legal issues and public disputes to allegations involving personal conduct, these controversies have drawn media attention and impacted his public image.

Milan Luthria spills behind-the-scene secrets of Ajay Devgn's daredevil stunt from 'Kachche Dhaage': 'His kurta, sheet, and vest, were torn and he got bruises...' - Exclusive

etimes.in / Apr 17, 2024, 01:57 (IST)

Milan Luthria delves into the captivating world of 'Kachche Dhaage' and Ajay Devgn's daring stunts. In an exclusive interview, he unveils the challenges behind the iconic train sequence, his bond with Devgn, and the legendary Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's music. Manisha Koirala and Namrata Shirodkar's casting anecdotes add charm.

AR Rahman: My attempt has always been to magnify the director's vision

Dec 27, 2023, 03:12 (IST)

"When I make a song I definitely want to give my 100% from the beginning, says AR Rahman

Amarrass Nights to pay tribute to Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan on 75th birth anniversary

PTI / Oct 12, 2023, 17:45 (IST)

Amarrass Nights, a platform to promote folk artists, will pay tribute to Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan on his 75th birth anniversary. The event will feature performances by Rehmat-e-Nusrat, a group of young qawwals, and the Mandolin Sisters. The Mandolin Sisters, who are the only sisters in India to play the mandolin, have performed at over 3,000 concerts worldwide. Amarrass Nights has been organizing events in Delhi since 2009, featuring renowned artists such as Barmer Boys and Charanjit Singh.

Shilpa lauds Farhan Sabir Live's act in India's Got Talent: 'You reminded me of Nushrat Fateh Ali Khan'

IANS / Sep 02, 2023, 16:33 (IST)

Farhan Sabir Live's rendition of "Piya Re Piya Re" received high appreciation from "India's Got Talent" judge Shilpa Shetty Kundra, who compared them to Nushrat Fateh Ali Khan Sahab.The talent competition show's Sunday episode features a celebration of the Janmashtami holiday in the company of devotional vocalist Anup Jalota.

Vicky Kaushal turns to Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's songs to get him through his early morning traffic woes - watch video

etimes.in / Jan 20, 2022, 12:47 (IST)

Vicky Kaushal never misses out on entertaining his fans with a glimpse of his day to day life. In the latest, the actor who is currently shooting for Laxman Utekar’s next with Sara Ali Khan, took to his Instagram story and offered a sneak peek into his morning jam while he was on his way for the shoot.

Indian Idol 12: Javed Akhtar feels contestant Danish Mohd has a 'jhalak' of the legendary Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jun 23, 2021, 14:19 (IST)

The latest episode of the reality singing show, Indian Idol 12 is paying a tribute to the veteran music composer, poet, lyricist, writer Javed Akhtar. Welcoming the man who has amazed the world with his heartfelt words, the legendary Javed Akhtar will be seen gracing the sets of Indian Idol.

Bigg Boss 14 fame Rahul Vaidya and girlfriend Disha Parmar attend a friend's wedding; former sings 'Piya Re' and other romantic numbers

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Mar 10, 2021, 11:33 (IST)

Rahul Vaidya and girlfriend Disha Parmar are busy attending the wedding functions of one of their close buddies. Being a singer, Rahul sang several melodious numbers at his friend's sangeet which left everyone enthralled.

Kalyan Kedar on cloud nine after ‘Kyun Mere’s success

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Jan 08, 2021, 12:52 (IST)

After launching the single ‘Kyun Mere’, talented singer Kalyan Kedar from The Netherlands is now all geared up for the release of its live version with full band ‘Unique’.

Ustad Rahat Fateh Ali Khan pays tribute to his guru Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan with ‘Sanson Ki Mala’ Cover

TNN / Nov 06, 2020, 21:26 (IST)

"I dedicate the release of ‘Sason Ki Mala’ to my mentor, Ustad Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan and my father Ustad Farrukh Fateh Ali Khan. The video of Sason Ki Mala is unique, with its locations and the entire feel of it is mesmerising…"

Missing being in studio, Yuvraaj Hans shares his version of Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's 'Jaani Door Gaye'

TIMESOFINDIA.COM / Apr 08, 2020, 14:08 (IST)

Just recently Yuvraaj Hans shared a video of him singing an unplugged version on ‘Raavi’ and got his fans hooked. And now he has again shared a clip of him singing, but this time it is a throwback video. Reminiscing the time he spent in the studio, recording his most loved songs, Yuvraaj Hans shared a clip wherein he is singing his version of Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's 'Jaani Door Gaye'

'Indian Idol 11' winner Sunny on recreating Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan's songs

IANS / Feb 26, 2020, 16:51 (IST)

Sunny Hindustani, the shoeshine boy from Bathinda in Punjab, bagged Bollywood projects even before he was announced the winner of "Indian Idol 11". During the course of the singing reality show, his choice of songs were mostly the ones sung by Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan.

Bathinda rejoices Sunny winning singing reality show Indian Idol 11

TNN / Feb 24, 2020, 20:00 (IST)

Celebrations erupted at the residence of Sunny Hindustani at Bathinda upon his winning the singing show Indian Idol 11 being aired at a private TV channel. Twenty One years Sunny rose from poor background while polishing shoes and turned out most admired singer in the show and got big number of votes from across the country to win the singing reality show.

Jubin Nautiyal: Kishore Kumar, Mohammed Rafi, Lata Mangeshkar, and Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan will live on for 100 years to come

Jun 25, 2021, 10:43 (IST)

In an exclusive interview with ETimes, Jubin Nautiyal opened up about shooting for music videos amidst the pandemic, the rising trend of independent music, his music idols, and more.

An evening with Rekha Bharadwaj

TNN / Jan 30, 2020, 20:34 (IST)

Rekha Bhardwaj, the queen of folk and sufi music mesmerised Punekars with her soulful numbers this weekend at a mall in Pune. She started with melodious ‘Koi Fariyaad’ and went on to sing to beautiful heart touching numbers like ‘Tere Ishq Mein.’ She enthralled the audience with her sensational hits like ‘Woh Kaghaz Ki Kashti’ and ‘Pyar Bhare Do Sharmeele Nain.’ On public demand, “Namak Ishq ka” song was played once again, and the powerful performance brought the audience on their feet.
